Build, manage, and monitor everything from simple web apps to complex cloud applications in a single, unified console.

Apply for trial Buy now

Build for the future now

An integrated work experience - anytime, anywhere

View and manage your applications: virtual machines, virtual networks, storage, and cloud services. You can personalize your experience based on your priorities.

Azure portal overview.

More personalized

Easier, simpler, and faster

This unified hub has radically simplified building, deploying, and managing cloud resources. Imagine a single easy-to-use console built just for you, your team, and your projects. You can customize the portal to fit your work and work style. Stay on top of the things that matter most by pinning them to your Startboard. Resize tiles to show just the right amount of detail and get insights across apps and resources.

Role-based access control

Enterprise-grade

Role-based access control gives you precise control over which users can manage which Azure service functions. Grant explicit management and access rights for subscriptions, services, and operation levels to individuals and groups.

No more billing blind spots

See forecasted costs at a glance

You can now easily track current and projected costs. The Azure portal automatically calculates your existing charges and forecasts your likely monthly charges, even if you’re managing hundreds of resources across several apps. It’s also easy to drill down into cross-cloud analytics and real-time active use data when you enable monitoring and diagnostics and monitor service metrics.

TextpageLeftNav.metaDescription: Use the Azure portal to build, manage, and monitor everything from simple web apps to complex cloud applications in a single, unified console. The Azure portal provides Azure users with an integrated deployment and management experience, with a simpler, faster, customizable operation interface and support for the brand new Resource Manager (ARM).
